name: Tall Poppy (itch)
description:
Tall Poppy is a fun-house horror experience where you must find your wifes purse and  a way off the church property before the prankster ghost gets you!

It's a short game (by design) with about 15-45 min of gameplay. How fast you go depends on how scared you yourself are while playing. 

System Requirements (Recommended)

OS: Windows 10 64 bit

Processor: i5 4000 series or better

Memory: 6 Gigs of RAM or better

Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 ti or better. 

Storage: 831 MB

Additional Notes: While testing on lower end machines, it played better if players lowered the render settings and set the graphics to a lower state. Your virus protection may think it's a bad and might not let it run.
